mapper.select: SELECT u.id userId, u.nickname nickname, u.role_id roleId, r.role_name roleName, p.menu_code menuCode, p.permission_code permissionCode FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = u.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON u.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id AND rp.delete_status = '1' WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.delete_status = '1'

SELECT a.`user_id` userId, a.`user_name` userName, b.`role_id` roleId, c.`role` roleName, e.`name` permissionCode FROM user_info AS a LEFT JOIN user_role AS b ON a.`user_id` = b.`user_id` LEFT JOIN role AS c ON c.`roleid` = b.`role_id` LEFT JOIN perm_role AS d ON c.`roleid` = d.`role_id` LEFT JOIN permission AS e ON d.`perm_id` = e.`perm_id` WHERE a.`user_code`=#{userCode} AND a.`status` = 0 AND e.`perm_id`!=6 AND b.`proj_id`=#{projId} ORDER BY a.`user_id` DESC;

SELECT a.user_id AS userId,a.`user_name` AS userName, b.`role_id` AS roleId,c.`role` AS roleName,a.`perm_list` AS permissionCode FROM user_info AS a LEFT JOIN user_role AS b ON a.`user_id`=b.`user_id` LEFT JOIN role AS c ON b.`role_id`=c.`roleid` WHERE a.`user_code`=#{userCode} AND a.`status` = 0 ORDER BY a.`user_id` DESC;
SELECT p.permission_code permissionCode FROM sys_permission p ORDER BY p.id
SELECT p.menu_code menuCode FROM sys_permission p ORDER BY p.id
